item.title: When does the 'shutdown database' trigger fire?
item.description: The chances of this being useful to anybody are fairly remote, but I was reading through my 'Bumper Book of Oracle Certification'and thought I’d check in what circumstances the ‘before shutdown’ trigger fires. This summarizes what I found: Shutdown normal Yes Shutdown immediate Yes Shutdown transactional Yes Shutdown abort No Shutdown of a startup-nomounted database No Shutdown of a mounted database No To be fair, this is exactly what I would have expected.
